scripts.dev: npm link pegs && yarn install && mkdir -p lib && yarn build && yarn link
scripts.watch: nodemon -w src/parser.pegs -x pegs src/parser.pegs lib/parser.js & tsc -p . --watch & yarn watchTest
scripts.watchTest: nodemon -w lib -w test -e js,ion lib/command.js test
scripts.watchWin: start yarn watchTest & start nodemon -w src/parser.pegs -x pegs src/parser.pegs lib/parser.js & start tsc -p . --watch
